h1: How Many Calories Are in a Quarter Pounder?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Quarter Pounder with Cheese; includes beef patty, bun, cheese, onions, pickles, ketchup, mustard; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant chain, preparation, portion size, and custom orders. Values based on standard serving; check official sources or apps for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A standard Quarter Pounder with Cheese contains about 520 calories and 30 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast-food packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a McDonald's Quarter Pounder?
faqs.a: Approximately 520 calories for the standard version with cheese.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a quarter pounder?
faqs.a: About 30 g of protein from the beef patty and cheese.

faqs.q: Does a quarter pounder have trans fats?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1 g of trans fat per burger due to the beef and bun.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a quarter pounder?
faqs.a: Roughly 1100 mg, mostly from condiments and cheese.

faqs.q: Are quarter pounder calories the same everywhere?
faqs.a: No, they vary by chain and customizations; McDonald's values used here.
